abstract: The design of satellite constellations require an understanding of the dynamic global coverage provided by the constellations.  We have developed a fast and simple algorithm for detemining the global constellation coverage dynamically using image processing techniques.  This approach provides a fast, powerful and simple method for the anysis of global constellation coverage.
title: Constellation Coverage Analysis
